name: Cows, Money and Karma Tycoon
description:
A tycoon game where you monetize livestock to score karma. Rogue-like real-time random-like crazy mess tycoon. This game has started on https://itch.io/jam/krassjam11

Also you can play it right away in a browser here: https://unfalsecoding.net/cmkt/CowsMoneyAndKarma/
